definition: the period of greatest prosperity or productivity, to produce or yield flowers
details:
noun
- the period of greatest prosperity or productivity
= synonyms: flush
- a powdery deposit on a surface
= synonyms: efflorescence
- reproductive organ of angiosperm plants especially one having showy or colorful parts
= synonyms: flower
- the organic process of bearing flowers
= example: the organic process of bearing flowers
= synonyms: blooming
- a rosy color (especially in the cheeks) taken as a sign of good health
= synonyms: blush
- the best time of youth
= synonyms: bloom of youth, salad days
verb
- to produce or yield flowers
= example: to produce or yield flowers
= synonyms: blossom, flower
